CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 26, 1952, page 14, reads: "'The Spirit' Greets Pittsburgh - Last week the welcome mat was rolled out for tall, vibrant Barbara Thompson of Houston, Tex. The Texas Southern University student representing this year's 'Spirit of Cotton,' stopped off in Pittsburgh for three busy days. While in Steel City Miss Thompson and her chaperone, Mrs. Daisy Bates, were taken on a whirlwind tour of the town, stopping for a visit to the Courier, the Mayor's office and appearances on several radio and television shows...Miss Thompson chats with Gloria Abdou, fashion commentator of radio station WCAE in the last photo. She also appeared on station WHOD. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: "Spirit of Cotton" representative and Texas Southern University student Barbara Thompson, WCAE fashion commentator Gloria Abdou, and Ethel Ramos Harris, seated around table in WCAE radio station studio
